title: Creamy curried butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['1 butternut squash', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '1 onion, chopped', '1 shallot, minced', '2 tablespoons curry powder, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 apple, cored and chopped', '1 slice fresh ginger, minced', 'water to cover', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', 'salt to taste']
